meanings.definition: A type of moth belonging to the family Pyralidae.
meanings.sent1: The pyralid fluttered gracefully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a pyralid resting on a flower.
meanings.sent3: The pyralid seemed to be playing hide-and-seek among the leaves.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as delicate as a pyralid's wings.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the colorful pyralid flying around.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to moths of the family Pyralidae.
meanings.sent1: The researcher studied the pyralid species in detail.
meanings.sent2: The pyralid caterpillar was camouflaged against the tree bark.
meanings.sent3: The pyralid pattern on the fabric looked surprisingly stylish.
meanings.sent4: Her room was decorated with pyralid-themed artwork.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with the sweet scent of pyralid-attracting flowers.
